SEARCH
Package gutek.entities.cards

Class CardConstantCoefficient

java.lang.Object
gutek.entities.cards.CardBase
gutek.entities.cards.CardConstantCoefficient
@Entity public class CardConstantCoefficient extends CardBase
Represents a card that uses constant coefficients for calculating revision times. This class extends CardBase and adds functionality for tracking revision times and incorrect answer counts for both regular and reverse revision processes.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardConstantCoefficient

      public CardConstantCoefficient(String front, String back, DeckBase deck)
      Constructs a new card with the given front and back content, and associated deck. This constructor also initializes the default revision times and resets the incorrect counters for both regular and reverse revisions.
      Parameters:
      front - the front content of the card
      back - the back content of the card
      deck - the deck to which the card belongs

  • Method Details

    • setRevisionDefault

      public void setRevisionDefault()
      Resets the revision parameters to their default values for regular revision. This sets the base revision time to 1.0 and resets the incorrect counter to 0.

    • setReverseRevisionDefault

      public void setReverseRevisionDefault()
      Resets the revision parameters to their default values for reverse revision. This sets the base reverse revision time to 1.0 and resets the reverse incorrect counter to 0.

    • setIncorrectCounter

      public void setIncorrectCounter(int incorrectCounter)
      Sets the incorrect counter for regular revision, ensuring it is non-negative.
      Parameters:
      incorrectCounter - the number of incorrect answers

    • setReverseIncorrectCounter

      public void setReverseIncorrectCounter(int reverseIncorrectCounter)
      Sets the incorrect counter for reverse revision, ensuring it is non-negative.
      Parameters:
      reverseIncorrectCounter - the number of incorrect answers in reverse revision

    • setBaseRevisionTime

      public void setBaseRevisionTime(double baseRevisionTime)
      Sets the base revision time for regular revision, ensuring it is positive.
      Parameters:
      baseRevisionTime - the base time for calculating the next regular revision

    • setBaseReverseRevisionTime

      public void setBaseReverseRevisionTime(double baseReverseRevisionTime)
      Sets the base revision time for reverse revision, ensuring it is positive.
      Parameters:
      baseReverseRevisionTime - the base time for calculating the next reverse revision
